name: Battle Forever
description: Battle Forever is an arcade Beat 'em Up which reminds you of the good old days in the penny arcade. Fight your way from left to right and leave no face unpunched! Four characters, 13 levels, a survival mode and a ton of fun awaits you!

reviews.review_text: I was excited by the look of this game as back in the 90s I played the likes of Vigilante , Double Dragon and many other like these.  The gameplay however is simply terrible. Controls, gameflow/sprites/scrolling and enemey AI just ruins everything.   I cannot recommend this game to anyone. :-(
